whyUs.title: Why Us ?
whyUs.reason2Desc: Practical clinical training and lab work.
whyUs.reason3Desc: Grants and stipends for continued education.

prizes.title: Prizes & Awards
prizes.desc:
Для категории Конкурсных участников предусмотрены ценные награды.
Победители и призёры будут определены по результатам ежедневных и итогового тестирований, а также с учётом рекомендаций экспертов и координаторов, активности на мастер-классах, семинарах, междисциплинарных обсуждениях за интересные вопросы, заданные экспертам Курсов.

Обратите внимание, что предусмотрены отдельные награды для участников Базового курса по онкологии и Базового курса по онкопатологии. Отдельными наградами будут отмечены участники команд с проектными работами, получившими высокую оценку экспертов и проектной комиссии.

tile1.title: Первое место
tile1.subtitle: БЕСПЛАТНАЯ ординатура мирового уровня
tile1.desc:
БЕСПЛАТНАЯ ординатура мирового уровня с менторским сопровождением и возможностью стажироваться в ведущих учреждениях РФ и зарубежья со стипендией от 40.000 до 120.000 руб./мес
* Первая, вторая или третья ординатура в РФ по любой выбранной специальности.
Предусмотрено две награды такого уровня: один для победителя Базового курса по онкологии, другой – для победителя Базового курса по онкопатологии.

tile2.title: Второе место
tile2.subtitle: Полностью оплачиваемая среднесрочная стажировка
tile2.desc: Полностью оплачиваемая среднесрочная стажировка (от 4 недель до 4 месяцев) в ведущих научно-клинических центрах России и за рубежом под руководством международно признанных экспертов в области онкологии и онкопатологии.

tile3.title: Третье место
tile3.subtitle: Полностью оплачиваемая краткосрочная стажировка
tile3.desc:
Частично оплачиваемая среднесрочная стажировка (от 4 недель до 4 месяцев) или
Полностью оплачиваемая краткосрочная стажировка (от 1 до 3 недель) в ведущих научно-клинических центрах России и за рубежом под руководством международно признанных экспертов в области онкологии и онкопатологии.

tile4.title: Дополнительные награды
tile4.desc:
• Профессиональная медицинская литература по онкологии и онкопатологии
  • Льготное участие в будущих мероприятиях EAFO и партнёрских организациях
  • Годовая подписка на онлайн-доступ к Классификации опухолей ВОЗ
  • Сувенирная продукция EAFO и памятные подарки

what_awaits_you.heading: Что вас ждет:
items: Лекции по основам онкологии и онкопатологии

Индивидуальная встреча с основателем БАЗОВЫХ МЕДИЦИНСКИХ КУРСОВ и всемирно известным хирургом-онкологом, а также основателем нескольких медицинских и немедицинских организаций – доктором Сомой (Сомасундарам СУБРАМАНИАН)

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Who are the Basic Medical Courses suitable for?
faq.a1: Базовые медицинские курсы подходят врачам неонкологических специальностей, студентам старших курсов медицинских ВУЗов и биомедицинских факультетов, ординаторам, аспирантам, а также представителям фармацевтической и другой медицинской промышленности.
faq.q2: How long does the course last, and can I attend only part of the program?
faq.a2: ⁠Курс длится 17 дней с 23 июля по 8 августа. Возможно модульное участие в программе блоками от одного дня, а также в тематических междисциплинарных Семинарах.
faq.q3: What certification documents will I receive after completing the Basic Course?
faq.a3: Если у Вас есть диплом о высшем медицинском образовании, возможно получение удостоверения установленного образца (тематического усовершенствования), сведение о документе будет внесено в ФИС ФРДО. Если у Вас нет диплома, вы получите сертификат, подтверждающий Ваше участие и прохождение программы в полном или неполном объеме.
faq.a4: Да, подтверждение знания языка необходимо для конкурсного участия. В программе запланировано участие иностранных экспертов, синхронный перевод не предусмотрен.
faq.q5: Can I attend the Basic Medical Course without accommodation if I live nearby?
faq.a5: Да, у нас есть возможность участия без проживания по сниженной цене, но рекомендуется рассмотреть возможность участия с проживанием, так как на курсе будет создана обстановка постоянно взаимодействия и общения, планируется разработка проектов в невебинарное время. В связи с этим, участие с проживанием будет более комфортным для Вас.
faq.a6: Да, у нас есть возможность дистанционного участия.

aboutEAFO.title: Почему выбирают нас?
aboutEAFO.description:
На протяжении уже более 15 лет мы создаём программы, которые помогают врачам по всему миру строить карьеру и находить единомышленников. Мы приглашаем международно признанных экспертов из ведущих центров России и стран зарубежья, чтобы участники могли учиться у лучших.

Наши курсы — это не просто лекции, а настоящая образовательная среда, где стираются границы между экспертами и участниками. После обучения наши выпускники продолжают карьеру в клиниках, научно-исследовательских лабораториях и медицинских центрах по всему миру. Присоединяйтесь к EAFO, чтобы стать частью живого сообщества единомышленников, где каждый может найти коллег, партнёров и друзей.

Each partnership we forge is dedicated to elevating the quality of care provided to patients, ensuring they receive the utmost attention and support.

courses.contactText: У Вас есть вопрос? Выберете удобный способ связи
courses.overviewContent1: Join us for the XI EAFO Basic Medical Courses hosted by the Eurasian Federation of Oncology (EAFO) in Magas, Republic of Ingushetia, Russian Federation.
courses.overviewContent2: This global event brings together leading experts, distinguished faculty, and enthusiastic participants from around the globe to teach the Basic in Oncology and Oncopathology.

features.title: Expert Workshops
features.desc: Carefully prepared by world experts, designed for both beginners and specialists in pathology.

features.title: Clinical Cases
features.desc: Access to prepared clinical and morphological observations with detailed diagnostic explanations.

features.title: Networking
features.desc: Opportunity to interact with experts in informal settings throughout the course.

features.title: Cultural Experience
features.desc: Visit architectural and cultural landmarks of the Russian Federation's capital.

certItems: University Certificate with Academic Hours (Russian Federation participants)
courses.ctaDesc: Apply now for the 45th EAFO OncoPathology Course and enhance your expertise in hematolymphoid pathology.

questions.question: How long does the visa process take?
questions.answer: The processing time typically takes 10-20 business days, but it can vary depending on your country of residence.

questions.question: What if my visa application is rejected?
questions.answer: In case of rejection, you can reapply after addressing the reasons for rejection. Our team can help review your application.

questions.question: Can I apply for a visa extension while in Russia?
questions.answer: Extensions are possible in exceptional circumstances and require approval from the local migration authorities.

visaFree.title: Visa-Free Countries
visaFree.heading: List of Visa-Free Countries to enter Russian Federation
visaFree.moreInfoPlaceholder: More details about the visa-free policy will appear here.
moreInfoPoints: Abkhazia - Visa not required for period of stay up to 90 days.

Argentina (for visits of up to 90 days in any 180-day period (starting from the day of first entry)). Applicants planning to stay for more than 90 days in any 180-day period require a visa if they are going to Russia to conduct commercial or work-related activities. Diplomatic or Official passport holders require a visa for the whole period of their stay.
Armenia - Visa not required for period of stay up to 90 days.
Azerbaijan
Belarus
Bolivia (for visits of up to 90 days)

Bosnia and Herzegovina (up to 30 days for tourists and up to 90 days for other visitors). Tourist documents or the original invitation, as appropriate, must be presented to the Russian Immigration authorities
Brazil (for visits of up to 90 days in any 180-day period) - for tourists, private visits or transit purposes only. In all other cases, a visa is required
Brunei (up to 14 days) – Diplomatic, Service and ordinary passport holders (except work, profit activities and study).
Chile (for visits of up to 90 days in any 180-day period) – the visa-free regime does not apply to work- and business-related visits and Diplomatic and Service passport holders
Columbia (for visits of up to 90 days in any 180-day period)
Cuba
Ecuador (up to 90 days in 180 days period). Except work, study and commercial business
El Salvador (up to 90 days). Except work, study and commercial business.
Fiji (up to 90 days in 180 days period except work, study and residence).
Guatemala (up to 90 days in 180 days period except work, study and residence)
Honduras (up to 90 days in 180 days period). Except work, study and commercial business.
Hong Kong (for visits of up to 14 days)

Israel (for visits of up to 90 days). Tourist documents or the original invitation, as appropriate, must be presented to the Russian Immigration authorities. The visa-free regime does not apply to Diplomatic and Service passport holders
Kazakhstan
Kirghiz Republic
Republic of Korea - Diplomatic passports holders up to 90 days. Holders of ordinary passports up to 60 days, except for work, study and residence
Democratic Republic of Laos (up to 90 days in 180 days period except work, study and residence).
Macedonia (up to 30 days for tourists and up to 90 days for other visitors). Tourist documents or the original invitation, as appropriate, must be presented to the Russian Immigration authorities
Macao (up to 30 days of stay). Except work, study and commercial business.
Mauritius (up to 60 days except work and study).
Moldova

Mongolia (up to 30 days) for the holders of diplomatic, official and foreign passports. In case of consequent trips, total amount of days spent in Russia cannot exceed 90 days in a period of 180 days from the date of first entrance. Except work, study and commercial business.
Montenegro (for visits of up to 30 days). The visa-free regime does not apply to Diplomatic and Service passport holders
Nauru (up to 14 days)
Nicaragua (for visits of up to 90 days)
Panama (up to 90 days in 180 days period except work, study and residence)
Paraguay (up to 90 days in 180 days period except work, study and residence)
Peru (for visits of up to 90 days in any 180-day period). The visa-free regime does not apply to work- and business-related visits and Diplomatic and Service passport holders
Seychelles (up to 30 days). Except work, study and commercial business.

Serbia - Citizens with biometric passports obtained after 9 April 2008 can stay in Russia for up to 30 days. Diplomatic or Official passport holders without accreditation in Russia can stay for up to 90 days. Serbian nationals with temporary and permanent resident permits can stay without time limits. In all other cases, a visa is required. The visa-free regime does not apply to Yugoslavian passport holders
The Republic of South Africa (for visits of up to 90 days)
Tajikistan
Ukraine - Citizens will be able to enter only either through the border point at 'Ludonka' near City of Pskov, or at Sheremetyevo International Airport (SVO, Moscow).
United Arab Emirates (up to 90 days)
Uruguay (up to 90 days in any 180-day period)
Uzbekistan
Vanuatu (up to 90 days). Except work, study and commercial business.
Venezuela (for visits of up to 90 days). The visa-free regime does not apply to Diplomatic and Service passport holders

embassies.title: Russian Embassies & Consulates
embassies.description: Participants of the EAFO OncoPathology Courses in Russian Federation can find further information on the Russian visa application process on the official website of the Russian Embassy or Consulate in their respective countries.

item2.title: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation

visaRequirements.note: Participants are strongly advised to visit these official websites to obtain specific information on visa requirements, application procedures, and guidelines for their respective countries when planning their trip to Russia for the course. It is crucial to carefully review the instructions provided by the Russian authorities to ensure a smooth and successful visa application process.

packages.title:
Базовый курс по онкологии
(17 дней – полный курс)
features: Частная онкология для клиницистов (рак молочной железы, рак легкого, колоректальный рак и др.)
Ценные призы (стипендия для прохождения ординатуры и стажировок в России и за рубежом)
Удостоверение о прохождении тематического усовершенствования (по запросу и за отдельную плату)
Обеды, ужины, кофе-брейки и Торжественный ужин
Доступ к лекционному материалу в Личном кабинете EAFO до 10 октября 2025 года включительно

packages.title:
Базовый курс по онкопатологии
(17 дней – полный курс)
features: Ценные призы (стипендия для прохождения ординатуры и стажировок в России и за рубежом)
Удостоверение о прохождении тематического усовершенствования (по запросу и за отдельную плату)
Обеды, ужины, кофе-брейки и Торжественный ужин
Доступ к лекционному материалу в Личном кабинете EAFO до 10 октября 2025 года включительно

packages.title:
Семинар
«Биология рака»
(1 день)
features: Основы фундаментальной онкологии, канцерогенеза и биологии поведения опухолевых клеток
Удостоверение о прохождении тематического усовершенствования (по запросу и за отдельную плату)
Доступ к выбранному модулю в Личном кабинете EAFO до 10 октября 2025 года включительно

packages.title:
Семинар
«Гематология – для НЕгематологов»
(2 дня)
features: Удостоверение о прохождении тематического усовершенствования (по запросу и за отдельную плату)

Любой отдельный
полный день (дни)
программы
features: Полный доступ к лекциям и мастер-классам выбранного дня (дней)
Удостоверение о прохождении тематического усовершенствования (по запросу и за отдельную плату)
Возможность общения с экспертами международного уровня

categories.title: Конкурсное участие (очное)
features: Полная программа Базового курса по онкологии (17 дней) или Базового курса по онкопатологии (17 дней) на выбор
Удостоверение о прохождении тематического усовершенствования с академическими часами -72/96 часов
Доступ к лекционному материалу в Личном кабинете EAFO до 10 октября 2025 года включительно
categories.details:
Конкурсное участие в Базовых медицинских курсах дает сразу два преимущества участникам, выбравшим эту категорию: специальная (субсидированная) цена и возможность выиграть ценные награды.

Условия конкурсного отбора:
  • На конкурсное участие могут претендовать: учащиеся (студенты, ординаторы, аспиранты) и врачи НЕонкологических специальностей до 35 лет по состоянию на 01 июля 2025 г.
  • Успешное прохождение вступительного испытания (тестирование)
  • Мотивационное письмо на русском или английском языке
  • Резюме
  • Средний балл (для студентов медицинских ВУЗов)*
  • Знание русского и английского языков является обязательным условием** Конкурсного участия. Приветствуется наличие сертификатов, подтверждающих знание английского, русского (для участников, не являющихся гражданами РФ) и других языков

*Средний балл необходимо подтвердить сканом академической справки или сканом всех страниц Вашей зачетной книжки
**Синхронный перевод выступлений не предусмотрен

categories.title: Внеконкурсное участие (очное)*
features: Льготная цена для сотрудников государственных и некоммерческих организаций**
Специальные предложения для представителей фармацевтических компаний и медицинской промышленности***
Полная программа Базового курса по онкологии (17 дней) или Базового курса по онкопатологии (17 дней)
Удостоверение о прохождении тематического усовершенствования с академическими часами -72/96 часов
Доступ к лекционному материалу в Личном кабинете EAFO до 10 октября 2025 года включительно
categories.details:
* Участники с категорией Внеконкурсного участия не могут претендовать на награды
** Льготное Внеконкурсное участие предусмотрено для работников государственных учреждений
*** При подаче более 3-х заявок на полный очный Курс или более 10-ти заявок на онлайн участие от одной организации

categories.title: Участие в модулях и семинарах (очно и онлайн)
features: Возможность гибкого участия в модулях и семинарах (1 или 2 дня)
Удостоверение о прохождении тематического усовершенствования с академическими часами - 6/8 часов за каждый день (по запросу)
Доступ к лекционному материалу в Личном кабинете EAFO до 10 октября 2025 года включительно

cta.title: Ready to Join?
cta.subtitle: Choose your preferred participation option and start your journey with EAFO.

hero.title: Supporting Excellence in Medical Education
hero.subtitle: Join our mission to advance oncology education and research worldwide

featured.name: Cancer Survivors, Relatives and Friends
featured.description: This event is supported by unlimited financial and technical support from a group of cancer survivors (including Dr. Soma), their relatives and friends who are dedicated to advancing oncology education.
featured.quote: "Together we can make a difference in cancer care and education through knowledge sharing and community support."

cta.title: Ready to Make an Impact?
cta.subtitle: Download our comprehensive sponsorship package and join our mission to advance medical education.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: EAFO's mission is reflected in its motto "Uniting Continents in Fighting Cancer", which emphasizes the need for global cooperation in combating cancer. The core purpose of the organization is to provide and facilitate cancer education by making knowledge accessible to all sections of the society.
mission.paragraph2: Though the name of the organization denotes a confined region, its activities and outreach are not restricted to the Eurasian continent, making it an inclusive organization open to collaborations and partnerships from all parts of the world.

aboutDetails.title: About EAFO
aboutDetails.paragraph1: Eurasian Federation of Oncology (EAFO) is an autonomous professional organization uniting oncologists, other healthcare professionals, anti-cancer & anti-tobacco advocates, patients, survivors, journalists, policy makers, oncology & anti-cancer organizations and others interested in combating cancer from all parts of Asia, Europe and beyond.
aboutDetails.paragraph2: The organization focuses on long-term initiatives dedicated to the health and well-being of cancer patients, survivors, and healthy individuals through education, innovation, and collaboration.

items.title: Multidisciplinary Forums
items.desc: Interactive sessions bringing together experts from various medical specialties.

items.title: OncoPathology Seminars
items.desc: Comprehensive practical sessions in pathology diagnostics and research.

items.title: Live OncoSurgery Classes
items.desc: Real-time surgical demonstrations and masterclasses by leading experts.

items.title: Radiotherapy Training
items.desc: Advanced seminars and practical sessions in radiation oncology.

items.title: Clinical Research
items.desc: Coordination of pre-clinical, clinical, and epidemiological studies.

items.title: OncoImaging Seminars
items.desc: Advanced imaging techniques and interpretation workshops.

items.title: ECRC Research Meetings
items.desc: Collaborative research initiatives and knowledge sharing sessions.

items.title: Patient Support
items.desc: Educational seminars and support programs for cancer patients.

items.title: Oncology Nursing
items.desc: Specialized training and development for oncology nursing professionals.

teams.title: Our Multidisciplinary Team
teams.description: Our team includes Medical, Surgical & Radiation Oncologists, Diagnostic & Interventional Radiologists, Pathologists, Geneticists, Researchers, Family Physicians, Advocates, Patients, Survivors, Policy Makers and more.

contact.title: Join Our Mission
contact.subtitle: Be part of our global initiative to combat cancer through education and collaboration

overview.title: Course Overview
overview.description: We are pleased to invite you to the XI EAFO Basic Medical Courses in Oncology and Oncopathology in Magas, Republic of Ingushetia, Russian Federation. This comprehensive program offers over 100 hours of specialized content across various fields of oncology.

events.title: Free Days
events.description: July 28 and August 3 are lecture-free days

events.description: The Basic Medical Courses traditionally include lectures in both Russian and English. Proficiency in both languages is required, including:

participation2.title: Competition Requirements
participation2.subtitle: To participate in the competition, you must:
requirements: Complete the entrance test on the website
Attach documents confirming foreign language proficiency

requiredDocuments.title: Required Documents
warnings: EAFO reserves the right to stop accepting applications in any category without prior notice
Online participants will only have access to theoretical parts of the course
Organizing committee may adjust prices based on updated accommodation costs
enrollment: Passport copy submitted via the registration form
For students: a copy of the student ID or a certificate from the institution
Signed Course Attendance Rules and Commitment Agreement
Payment from the participant, either as an individual or from the participant's institution
certificate: Passport copy (pages with photo and registration)
Copy of SNILS (Individual Insurance Account Number)

features.title: Course Access
features.description: Access to all theoretical and practical sessions with translation

features.title: Materials
features.description: Study materials, badge, program, and printed handouts

features.title: Visa Support
features.description: Visa invitation letter in accordance with Russian regulations

participations.title: Preferential Competitive Participation
participations.description: Based on the competition results, a ranking will be formed among the applicants. Enrollment is conducted in three stages with a limited number of seats:

participations.title: Preferential Non-Competitive Participation
participations.description: Available for participants who did not pass the competitive selection. A total of 30 seats available, without stage limitations:

participations.title: Non-Competitive Participation
participations.description: For participants sponsored by industry or employers, representatives of pharmaceutical companies, and the medical industry. A total of 15 seats available, without stage limitations:

travelReimbursement.title: Travel Expense Reimbursement
travelReimbursement.description: Participants with accepted Abstracts, Pathology Cases or Research Proposals may receive:

importantNotes.title: Important Information
accommodation: During training days, hotel guests are provided with three meals a day and coffee breaks.
On weekends, only breakfast is provided for hotel guests.
Additional accommodation options in Magas are available at an extra cost.
warnings: If you cancel before May 20, you will receive a 90% refund.
If you cancel before June 20, you will receive a 50% refund.
If you cancel after July 20, no refund will be provided.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey in Oncology?
cta.subtitle: Join our comprehensive medical education program and advance your career in oncology.

preRegister: Application for participation in the XI EAFO Basic Medical Courses
name: Name
agreement: I agree with the Terms of the Agreement and the Privacy Policy
personalData: I give my Consent to the processing of my personal data
promotions: I give my Consent to receive promotional materials
pleaseAgree: Please agree to the required terms before submitting.

conference.title: Conference Hall
conference.desc: The Artis Plaza conference hall in the heart of Magas is a spacious venue that can accommodate up to 200 guests. It is equipped with modern audiovisual equipment to ensure the success of your event. With on-site catering services, we provide comfortable conditions for both organizers and participants.

vip.title: VIP Hall
vip.desc: The VIP hall at the Artis Plaza Hotel is a unique place where you can host any event in luxurious conditions, with a clean and spacious interior and top-level equipment. Our team of professionals is ready to offer a full range of services, including catering, video projection, sound equipment, and much more.

restaurant.title: Restaurant
restaurant.desc: The Artis Plaza Restaurant is an exquisite venue in the heart of Magas where culinary mastery meets elegant ambiance. Located on the sixth floor of the hotel, the restaurant offers national and European cuisine prepared with special attention to detail. Guests can enjoy breakfast, lunch, and dinner in a cozy setting with views of the city.

smartHotel.title: Smart Hotel
smartHotel.description: Smart Hotel 'Magas' offers a stylish and tech-savvy approach to accommodation. The hotel is ideal for both individual guests and groups, including students and youth delegations. The rooms are designed in a modern style and equipped with everything needed for a comfortable stay. The hotel also offers convenient workspaces, a hammam, and a lounge area.

businessHotel.title: Business Hotel
businessHotel.description: Business Hotel 'Magas' is a modern four-star hotel offering a high level of comfort and service. The hotel offers rooms of various categories — from standard to luxury. Amenities include a restaurant with diverse cuisine, a fitness center, sauna, and conference rooms.

step1.title: 1. Submit an Application
step1.description: Fill out the registration form at [insert link]
step1.details: Complete the registration form with all the required information.

step2.title: 2. Log in to Your EAFO Account
step2.description: We will send you an email with a link to log in.
step2.details: Complete the steps to verify your email and set up your account.

step3.title: 3. Fill Out Information in Your EAFO Account

step4.title: 4. Choose Your Participation Format
step4.description: Select your preferred format of participation.
step4.details: You can choose between online, offline, or hybrid formats.

step5.title: 5. Go Through the Selection Process
step5.details: Review the conditions and steps for competitive selection.

step6.title: 6. Make Payment and Sign the Contract
step6.description: Your participation will be confirmed after payment.
step6.details: Follow the payment instructions and sign the contract.

hero.title: About the city
hero.subtitle: Magas, Republic of Ingushetia
hero.alt: View of Magas, the capital of Ingushetia, modern buildings, mountains in the background, clear sky

location.title: Where is the city of Magas located?
location.description: Magas is located in the southern part of Russia, in the North Caucasus. This is the administrative center and capital of the Republic of Ingushetia, one of the promising and dynamically developing regions of the Russian Federation...
location.imageAlt: Panoramic view of Magas, mountains on the horizon, modern architecture

languagesReligion.title: Languages and religions
languagesReligion.languages: In Magas and throughout the Republic of Ingushetia, the main languages are Ingush and Russian. Russian is the official language, widely used in business, education and administrative spheres.
languagesReligion.religions: The main religion of the region is Islam, which has a significant impact on cultural and public life...
languagesReligion.imageAlt: Cultural center of Magas, traditional Ingush patterns, religious monuments

culture.title: Culture
culture.description1: The culture of Magas is a reflection of the rich historical, ethnic and religious heritage of Ingushetia...
culture.description2: Exhibitions, concerts, festivals and cultural events are regularly held here, popularizing Ingush culture...
culture.imageAlt: Cultural center of Magas, traditional Ingush patterns, religious monuments

howToReach.title: How to get to the venue?
howToReach.intro: You can get to the Artis Plaza Hotel in Magas in different ways depending on your location and preferences. Here are the main options:

byPlane.title: By plane
byPlane.note: The time is indicated for a trip by car or taxi. From these airports you can also get to the Artis Plaza Hotel by intercity buses.

flights.title: Flights from Moscow:
flights.description: Regular direct flights are operated to Magas (IGT), Makhachkala (MCX), Mineralnye Vody (MRV), Vladikavkaz (OGZ), Nalchik (NAL) and Grozny (GRV) airports.
flights.airlines: Aeroflot, S7 Airlines, UTair, Nordwind Airlines.

byTrain.title: By train
byTrain.description: The nearest railway station to Magas is the city of Nazran (10 km from Magas). From Nazran station it is convenient to get to Magas by taxi or intercity bus.
routes: Direct flights: Vladikavkaz - Nazran, Rostov-on-Don - Nazran
Long-distance trains: Moscow - Vladikavkaz, St. Petersburg - Vladikavkaz
byTrain.note: We recommend purchasing tickets in advance through official websites or at station ticket offices.

byCar.title: By car
byCar.description: Magas is located in the center of the North Caucasian and Southern federal districts. The city has convenient transport accessibility via federal and regional roads from most cities in these regions.
